page.title: 08What are our attitudes ?
page.content: Generally people feel quite{satisfied} with their way of life and indeed many have moved here specifically to enjoy the peaceful environment and more exclusive lifestyle which is typical of the area. It is seen by most as a{friendly}place to live although some{conflict}exists between the original inhabitants and the newer, more mobile incomers. The younger people feel that there is a lack of organised{entertainment.} Parents acknowledge this and are usually willing to provide{transport} for their offspring to nearby towns. Youngsters expect to run a car at 18. {Planning policy}upsets some people who think that they should be allowed to do as they like on their own land but others agree with it because it offers them some protection from unwelcome speculation and development.
